stories.original_headline: Ghost particles slip through Earth and spark a hidden atomic reaction
stories.original_summary: Scientists have managed to observe solar neutrinos carrying out a rare atomic transformation deep underground, converting carbon-13 into nitrogen-13 inside the SNO+ detector. stories.fantasy_headline: Ethereal Sun-Sprites Cause Secret Elemental Change Deep Below!
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild in the Whispering Caves has witnessed tiny sun-sprites causing a rare elemental shift. These fleeting specters, usually unseen, transmute one essence into another deep within the earth. Their magical looking-glass detected faint gleams of arcane energy confirming this subtle magic.

stories.original_headline: Scientists find dark chocolate ingredient that slows aging
stories.original_summary: Scientists have uncovered a surprising link between dark chocolate and slower aging. A natural cocoa compound called theobromine was found in higher levels among people who appeared biologically younger than their real age.
stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Discover Cacao Elixir Holds Secret to Youthful Vigor!
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Wizards of Longevity have unearthed a wondrous secret within dark cacao beans. A mystic essence, dubbed "theobromine," was found in abundance in those who seemed much younger than their true age. This enchanted treat may soon grant many a prolonged youthful appearance.

stories.original_headline: My defense of a $40 cable paperweight – I’m sorry
stories.original_summary: Warning: I'm going to make an attempt to justify a $40 paperweight for cable management. I'm not sure how I ended up in this position, or who hurt me. stories.fantasy_headline: A Worthy Device? The Pricey Gravity Stone for Arcane Cords.
stories.fantasy_story: A seasoned merchant has surprisingly championed an expensive artifact, the Gravity Stone, costing 40 gold coins. This curious item, forged by the Guild of Native Union, is said to tame unruly arcane cords and keep magical ley-lines perfectly organized on a scribe's desk. Despite its cost, the merchant insists on its merit.

stories.fantasy_headline: Two Grand New Quests for Lara Croft, the Relic Hunter!
stories.fantasy_story: At the esteemed Grand Storyteller's Conclave, it was proclaimed that Lara Croft, the famed Relic Hunter, would embark on not one, but two new quests! The Crystal Scribes and Amazonian Lorekeepers guilds are preparing these epic tales to be unveiled in the coming two turns of the sun.
